pages.text: $(li)Komodo dragons are light greenish-brown color creatures and they are hostile creatures with you that can be found in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/jungle/jungle)Jungles$(/l).$(br)$(li)They can be tamed with a stack of $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/rotten_flesh)Rotten Flesh$(/l).$(br)$(li)Tamed Komodo Dragons can be ridden without a $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/saddle)Saddle$(/l) and they will fight for you.
$(li)When attack a prey, a tamed Komodo Dragon will ignore all commands from you.
